original_title: Libby and Daughtry's World's Best Sleepover Ever
overview: Libby and Daughtry are cousin best friends who have sleepovers every weekend. When the most popular girl in school unexpectedly agrees to hang out with them one night, she makes Libby question if she really knows her cousin best friend at all.
title: Libby and Daughtry's World's Best Sleepover Ever
